text: 💉 What logistical challenges does #Africa face in rolling out #Covid19 #vaccine? This week’s @Africa__Calling #news #podcast from @RFI_En examines #Africa’s mass vaccination campaigns, featuring @AfricaCDC's @JNkengasong @kevinmarsh8 & @AbdoulayeDiop8 📻 https://t.co/11gDfgLEqp https://t.co/X5PZhhzk68
